properties.description: The Pagoda, Clubhouse, Kellands Park, Inverurie. Every Friday 12pm - 2pm , free hot drinks and cake. With the cost of living rising and everyone feeling the pinch, the club are looking to help the community by providing a safe, warm, friendly environment for anyone who might need it.
